name: Ridge walk
description:
A downloadable demo version


The moment before you fall asleep... This short game heals your mind.

Ridge walk is a night-walk on the line between sky and building wish slowly and comfortable music. The cute and wabi-sabi world waiting for you. Let's enjoy the wasting time!

Japanese
This is a demo  :  PC

The game is in development and this is an early demo build.
Releasing a mobile application is my goal.


  • WASD or Arrow keys  -  movement
  • Space  -  jump
  • Enter  -  talk
  • P  -  pause
  • Esc  -  quit

You can use mouse or keyboard. 
A message about tools is shown at the bottom of the screen. 

  • Click / Key  -  mouse and keyboard
  • Click  -  mouse

  • Made with Unreal Engine
  • Game screen  -  512 x 790 pixel
    When the display resolution of your pc is 1920x1080, set the display scale is 100％–125％.
